DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis Insomnia 's Disease ; Aged 1860 ( include 18 60 ) ; Does attend clinical researcher ; Participation researcher sign informed consent voluntary ; Pittsburgh sleep index ( PSQI ) index > 7 point ; Athens scale 6 point ; Depression scale anxiety scale 50 point less . BreathingRelated Sleep disorder ; Circadian rhythm disorder ; Sleep disorder ; Druginduced insomnia ( drug abuse , drug treatment ) ; Sleep disorder cause poor diet , lifestyle factor ( Longterm excessive drinking , coffee , tea , etc . ) ; All systemic disease ( pain , fever , cough , surgery , etc . ) external environment disturbance factor ; With cardiovascular , lung , liver , kidney hematopoietic system serious primary disease ; Patients mental illness ; Pregnancy breastfeed woman ; Acupoints severe skin infection ; Patients afraid acupuncture ; Advanced malignant tumor serious waste disease , infection bleeding ; Who meet inclusion criterion , poor compliance , treatment , accord stipulation judge curative effect data congruent affect curative effect safety judgment ; Caused excessive anxiety depression patient insomnia .
